product_name: florence by millsClear The Way Clarifying Face Wash
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganflorence by mills' Clear The Way Clarifying Face Wash is a foaming cleanser that helps control oil, minimizes the appearance of pores, and exfoliates skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsHelps control oil, dissolve pore clogging debris & minimize the appearance of poresExfoliates for softer, smoother-looking skinHelps to soothe stressed skinVegan & cruelty-freeKey IngredientsNiacinamide (Vitamin B3) helps control excess oil, minimizes the appearance of pores & corrects the look of surface dullnessSalicylic acid helps unclog & visibly minimizes poresLactic & glycolic acids help exfoliate surface layers of skin for a smoother textureLavender essential oil is known for its skin soothing propertiesFormulated WithoutSulfatesParabensItem 2597331How To UseApply 2-3 pumps to hands and massage onto wet skin. Rinse thoroughly. Avoid contact with eyes.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Glycerin, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Sodium Cocoamphoacetate, Propanediol, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Salicylic Acid, Niacinamide, Gluconolactone, Lactic Acid, Glycolic Acid, Cocamidopropyl Hydroxysultaine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Xanthan Gum, Calcium Gluconate, Amylopectin, Dextrin, Polydextrose, Phenoxyethanol, Tocopherol, Linalool.
how_to_use: Apply 2-3 pumps to hands and massage onto wet skin. Rinse thoroughly. Avoid contact with eyes.

reviews.headline: It's sooo good
reviews.comments: I love it!

reviews.headline: Absolute best
reviews.comments: This is handw down the best morning cleanser I've ever used. Its gentle, has a pleasant scent, gives you the richest foam put of any foam cleanser I've ever used, clears up and prevents acne‚Ä¶it's just perfect, and I really hope the formula never changes or this gets discotinued. It's on sale now and I bought 4 bottles and honestly might get more because its not usually on sale‚Ä¶so now I'm REALLY hoping it isn't being phased out.

reviews.headline: Not a fan of the scent
reviews.comments: I read reviews before purchasing and noticed a few mentions of the scent, but still gave it a try. The first few uses, the scent didn't bother me too much, but then I just couldn't continue using it. It began drying my skin out and leaving super dry red patches, especially over my cheeks. Just wasn't for me.

reviews.headline: Best morning face wash!!
reviews.comments: I absolutely LOVE this face wash! The foam is thick and creamy and cleanses my skin without overdrying. Some reviews mention the smell and yes, there is a strong lavender scent but it's real lavender essential oil, not that nasty perfume lavender. I love the smell and the infredients are clean and effective.

reviews.headline: Do Not Recommend!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love Millie but this made me break out bad.My face is red after and it mafe my face burn bad.This could just be me no hate love you Millieüíú

reviews.headline: Very favorite
reviews.comments: this is one of the only face washes that actually has worked for my face smells so so good and works really really well

reviews.headline: Smells so good
reviews.comments: Smells like lavender this is that face wash that you need!

reviews.headline: dead skin be gone
reviews.comments: your face feels and looks clean after use but left my skin with lines and a stinging sensation. probably once a week use not for everyday. does not smell good at all, it smells like chemicals.  I have eczema prone skin. dry with sensitivity.

reviews.headline: delightful morning face wash
reviews.comments:
First off - if you are looking for a makeup removing face wash, this is not it. It does not advertise itself as such, granted. From it's description, this is a face wash meant to "control oil, while salicylic acid helps minimize the appearance of pores. Glycolic and lactic acids help exfoliate surface layers of skin for smoother, softer texture." I recommend this is as a morning face wash. It reminds me a bit of the 
Shiseido Complete Cleansing Microfoam - intentional dupe or not, I don't know, but I know I really like this face wash.

reviews.headline: smells like heaven
reviews.comments: i hate lavender, and i'm saying that. it is so gentle and nice on the skin, it smells so great‚Ä¶ it irritates my jaw area sometimes but i'm very sensitive there‚Ä¶

reviews.headline: ORANGE STORE EMPLOYEE REVIEW!!
reviews.comments: I got this product as a part of my gratice and tried it on a whim. I have been struggling aith raised bumps on my face that arent pimples but i cant pop or pick at them. I used this face wash ONE TIME and my skin legitimately looks facetuned in real life. I honestly havent tried anything else from this brand so im not sure how everything else preforms, but THIS product DID THAT üëèüèªüëèüèª highly recommended!

reviews.headline: Worth It
reviews.comments: A gentle yet very cleansing wash. Leaves my skin smooth. Does not irritate my skin. Does not cause acne. Does not cause excess oil production. However, if I use it too often or leave it on my face too long it can make my skin feel dry and stiff. However, still worth it.

reviews.headline: LOVE! Honest Great Review!!!
reviews.comments:
I usually only do reviews when i'm absolutely blown away by a product and actually finished it to see results. When I say that this cleanser is all that!!! Wow. Took years off my face I swear. It battled my hyperpigmentation, it's hydrating (*skin looking like a drink of water from a glass bottle), even reduced inflammation. Got my rough texture all the way together and my skin always felt clean but not tight and dried. Dewy and ready for the rest of my regimen. 

Note: I use the Salicylic Acid moisturizer by CeraVe with this cleanser. Great pairing.

reviews.headline: Would totally recommend
reviews.comments: I love this product. I have this and I love using it every night, it's so smooth. Would always recommend as first product to buy!

reviews.headline: Smells amazing, but I feel like it burned my face.
reviews.comments: This facial cleanser smells absolutely amazing, however, I think it burned by face.  The next day, my face was dry and felt like I had a sunburn.  I have oily skin, so this was super powerful stuff.  I guess it's going to depend on your skin.

reviews.headline: Best face wash ever
reviews.comments: If you use it twice a day every day it can be a little drying, but if you have oily skin it's perfect! I adore this product as it thoroughly cleans my skin and leaves flawless results. It's a great price for what it is and I have not had any better experience with another face wash than I had with this, it really is the best one I've ever tried.

reviews.headline: Foaming Clarifying Face Wash by Florence by Mills
reviews.comments: Love this! I've had it for a couple days and honestly noticed my acne scars getting lighter! I have acne prone skin and as a teenager I am always looking for something to help/prevent that. I personally loved this and want to try the serum, toner, and mask from the clarifying line as well! definitely a repurchase! +very affordable!!

reviews.headline: Florence
reviews.comments: My daughter used this and broke out in a terrible rash all over her face. We are on day 3 and she still has a little rash.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: My fav face wash just wish there weren't essential oils

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: My fav face wash just wish there weren't essential oils

faceoff_positive.comments: I was provided a free sample as part of the #florencepanel by florence by mills to try this product and write an honest review! I was excited to try this because my skin has been acting up lately so i thought maybe a new product could help. I was a bit nervous however because I have veryyyyy sensitive skin that can be quite acne prone and I just get allergic reactions to random things. I have been using this wash for a few days though and no problems yet! I find it to be not drying at all which can be a problem I have with even moisturizing products for dry skin so that is a plus! ( i hate that tight feeling your face gets when you wash ti and this doesn't do that!) i deff will keep using it to see if it helps clear up the spots i've been breaking out in lately and would definitely try this wash with other florence by mills skincare products to see if a new routine would help me! The only thing i would considered a "con" of this product is the scent, I just was expecting it to be scent free for some reason so i was surprised by its strong smell. It isn't bad and I actually like that it isn't added fragrance (just essential oil) but it was just a bit strong at first! I like lavender however so if you like that you will be fine, if you dont then you might find it a bit strong! overall I am happy with the product and will continue to use it to see how it helps my skin!
faceoff_positive.headline: Good gentle cleanser!

faceoff_negative.comments: Hello! I received a sample product for the #florencepanel and I couldn't be more thankful for the opportunity. Unfortunately I did not have a good experience. It felt nice and refreshing at first, but within three days, patches of my skin became flaky, red, dry, and would sting when other products were applied. I have dry skin, where foam cleansers should be carefully used. I'll continue to use it (after repairing my skin) under three times per week. Be careful, loves. If this happens, remove actives (such as vitamin C and niacinamide), switch to a gentle cleanser (like the Clean Magic Face Wash) and search for products to fix your barrier. I'm sorry to be such a downer, but then again this could be GREAT for others!! Everyone's skin is different. And unfortunately, this product isn't for me. Happy Cleansing, dearies üíî.
faceoff_negative.headline: Good until it broke my skin barrier‚Ä¶ #florencepanel
